Class TreePrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.TreePrinter

  • public class TreePrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that draws the tree on the canvas using JavaFX

    Wouter

    • Method Detail

      • addContextMenuToNode

        private void addContextMenuToNode(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane node,
                                  AttackTreeNode atn)
        Adds a ContextMenu if the user right clicks on a node with the options Edit and Delete
        Parameters:
        node - Visual representation of the node
        atn - Back-end AttackTreeNode

      • createNodePane

        private javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane createNodePane(AttackTreeNode atn)
        Creates the visual representation of the AttackTreeNode. It consists of an AnchorPane with labels for name, operation and parameters. A rectangle surrounds these labels.
        Parameters:
        atn - node for which a visual representation must be generated
        Returns:
        anchorpane

      • drawLines

        private void drawLines()
        Draw lines (after height was optimalized)

      • drawParent

        private void drawParent(AttackTreeNode parent)
        Draw parent by finding the leftmost and rightmost child and placing itself on the middle above them.
        Parameters:
        parent - The node that is a parent

      • drawTree

        public void drawTree()
        Draws the tree on the Pane. The method recursiveDrawLeft() fills the nodesMap by going through the tree from left to right (recursively) and creating the nodes (and their appropriate X-coordinates). The graphical representation is created in createNode(). Subsequently the height is optimized and then everything is drawn on the pane

      • exportAsPNG

        public void exportAsPNG()
        Creates a snapshot of the current visualization of the tree. A FileChooser shows up to let the user decide where to save the image. The extension is .PNG.

      • optimalizeHeight

        private void optimalizeHeight()
        Reduce height of all levels, based on the largest node on each level

      • recursiveDrawLeft

        private void recursiveDrawLeft(AttackTreeNode atn)
        Recursive method that draws the nodes from left to right. Every next node is placed to the right of the imaginary vertical line of the right border of the previous node.
        Parameters:
        atn - Node to be drawn

      • setHeuristic

        public void setHeuristic(Heuristics h)

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int width)
